page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE - MORNING
page.content: I awake on a sunny Thursday morning, my mother is already preparing for a long day looking after our two babies. I grope for my watch and as usual its time to get up, 8am. My sister is now using the bathroom, I haven't got much chance of going in there for half an hour. I roll out of bed and dress in my school uniform. Picking up my bag, I dash down stairs and eat a breakfast of cereal and toast. Then after saying my goodbyes, I'm off to school. I meet with my friend and we set off down the canal bank towards Lymm High School. The lessons are enjoyable on Thursday, games, Maths and Science. Now comes lunchtime, our lunches are self-service and show a range of foods from pizza to grapefruit.
